item.title: 芯片股因 ASML 下调预期、美国人工智能芯片出口可能设上限而下跌
item.description: 周二，美国半导体股票下跌，此前芯片设备制造商ASML下调了其年度销售预期，而且有报道称拜登政府正在考虑限制向一些国家销售先进的人工智能处理器。【原文：U.S. semiconductor stocks fell on Tuesday after chip equipment maker ASML cut its annual sales forecast and a report said the Biden administration was considering capping sales of advanced artificial intelligence processors to some countries.】

item.title: 意大利奢侈品集团菲拉格慕第三季度收入下降 7.2
item.description: 意大利奢侈品集团 Salvatore Ferragamo 周二表示，受亚洲需求疲软的影响，按固定汇率计算，该公司今年第三季度的收入下降了 7.2%。【原文：Revenues at Italian luxury group Salvatore Ferragamo fell by 7.2% at constant exchange rates in the third quarter of the year, hit by weak demand in Asia, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯再次上调 2024 年指导目标，理由是品牌发展势头良好
item.description: 阿迪达斯周二上调了全年销售额和利润指导，理由是第三季度业绩好于预期，以及三条纹 Samba 和 Gazelle 鞋的热销带来的良好品牌势头。【原文：Adidas on Tuesday raised its full-year sales and profit guidance, citing better than expected performance in the third quarter and good brand momentum as it benefits from popularity of its three-striped Samba and Gazelle shoes.】

item.title: NRF 预测：2024 年美国假日销售额将增长 3.5
item.description: 美国全国零售联合会周二预测，由于购物者变得更加节俭，对非必需品的消费更加挑剔，美国假日销售额预计将增长多达 3.5%，为六年来最慢。【原文：U.S. holiday sales are expected to grow as much as 3.5%, the slowest pace in six years, the National Retail Federation forecast on Tuesday, as shoppers turn more frugal and get picky with spending on non-essentials.】

item.title: 受中国市场影响，LVMH 集团第三季度销售额下降 3
item.description: 周二，法国奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）公布第三季度销售额下降 3%，这是该集团自大流行病以来首次出现季度销售额下降，原因是价格上涨和经济不确定性阻碍了购物者的热情。【原文：French luxury giant LVMH reported a 3% fall in third-quarter sales on Tuesday, its first decline in quarterly sales since the pandemic, as rising prices and economic uncertainty held back shoppers.】

item.title: 特斯拉工厂第一阶段扩建获得德国当局绿灯
item.description: 本周二，当地环境部批准特斯拉在柏林附近的工厂再建一个大型车间，特斯拉距离实现产能翻番的计划又近了一步。【原文：Tesla came one step closer to achieving its planned doubling of capacity at its plant near Berlin on Tuesday when the local environment ministry granted approval for it to build another large hall.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称货币政策仍能降低通胀
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周二表示，即使在上个月降息之后，货币政策仍在努力降低通胀压力。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said on Tuesday that even with last month’s rate cut monetary policy is still working to bring inflation pressures down.】

item.title: ASML 提前公布第三季度财报，下调业绩预期，股价下跌
item.description: 计算机芯片设备制造商 ASML 周二在其网站上提前公布了第三季度财报，报告称预订情况疲软，并下调了 2025 年的销售预期，截至格林尼治标准时间 15:00 时，其股价下跌了 15%。【原文：Computer chip equipment maker ASML on Tuesday reported weak bookings and cut 2025 sales forecasts in third quarter earnings published early on its website, sending its shares down 15% by 1500 GMT.】

item.title: 美国消费者认为长期通胀上升，拖欠贷款风险上升
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周二在一份报告中称，美国人表示，他们预计上个月的通胀率会长期走高，因为他们对信贷动荡的预期升至2020年4月以来的最高水平。【原文：Americans said they expected higher inflation over the longer run last month, as their expectations of credit turbulence rose to the highest level since April 2020, the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said in a report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果推出具有人工智能功能的新款 iPad mini
item.description: 苹果公司周二推出了新一代 iPad mini，该产品搭载了包括书写工具和改进型 Siri 助手在内的人工智能功能。【原文：Apple on Tuesday launched its new generation of the iPad mini packed with AI features including writing tools and an improved Siri assistant, as the iPhone maker races to boost its devices with artificial-intelligence capabilities.】

item.title: 美国因汉莎航空对待犹太乘客问题对其处以 400 万美元罚款
item.description: 美国运输部周二表示，将对汉莎航空公司处以 400 万美元的罚款，原因是该公司在 2022 年 5 月歧视从纽约经法兰克福前往布达佩斯的犹太乘客。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department said Tuesday it is imposing a $4 million penalty against Lufthansa for discriminating against Jewish passengers from New York through Frankfurt to Budapest in May 2022.】

item.title: 辉瑞在与 Starboard 的斗争中启用 Vanguard 资深董事
item.description: 辉瑞公司在面临激进对冲基金 Starboard Value 的压力之际，于周二任命了该制药巨头的最大投资者 Vanguard 公司的前首席执行官进入董事会。【原文：Pfizer appointed a former chief executive officer at Vanguard, the drug giant's biggest investor, to its board on Tuesday as it faces pressure from activist hedge fund Starboard Value.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克起诉 Moderna 侵犯 COVID 疫苗在美国的专利权
item.description: 本周二，葛兰素史克公司在特拉华州联邦法院起诉 Moderna 公司，指控其生产的 COVID-19 大卖点疫苗 Spikevax 侵犯了葛兰素史克公司在信使核糖核酸 (mRNA) 技术方面的专利权。【原文：GlaxoSmithKline sued Moderna in Delaware federal court on Tuesday for allegedly violating GSK's patent rights in messenger RNA (mRNA) technology with its blockbuster COVID-19 vaccine Spikevax.】

item.title: Blackstone 将投资 82 亿美元在西班牙东北部建立数据中心
item.description: 全球最大的另类资产管理公司 Blackstone 计划投资 75 亿欧元（82 亿美元）在西班牙阿拉贡开发数据中心，从而提升该地区作为欧洲主要云计算中心的地位。【原文：Blackstone , the world's largest alternative asset manager, plans to invest 7.5 billion euros ($8.2 billion) to develop data centres in Spain's Aragon, boosting the region's growing status as a major cloud computing hub in Europe.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会对电信公司使用数据上限展开正式调查
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（Federal Communications Commission）周二表示，将对电信公司使用数据上限及其对消费者和竞争的影响展开正式调查。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission said Tuesday it is opening a formal inquiry into the use of data caps by telecom firms and how they impact consumers and competition.】

item.title: 华尔街银行受投资银行业务收益推动
item.description: 华尔街最大的银行报告称，第三季度投资银行业务费用上升，原因是交易增多，公司发债增加。【原文：Wall Street's biggest banks reported rising investment-banking fees in the third quarter fueled by more deals and as companies increasingly issued debt, and said that their pipeline of new activity looked healthy - although some areas are slower to return.】

item.title: 美国将三家中国公司列入需要额外出口检查的 "未经核实名单
item.description: 美国商务部周二将三家中国公司列入官员无法检查的接受美国出口产品的公司名单。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department on Tuesday added three companies in China to a list of firms receiving U.S. exports that officials have been unable to inspect.】

item.title: 嘉信理财第三季度利润因资产管理费增加而大幅增长
item.description: 周二，受资产管理费飙升和客户资产创历史新高的推动，经纪公司嘉信理财（Charles Schwab）第三季度净收入增长约 25%，使其股价在盘前交易中上涨超过 9%。【原文：Brokerage firm Charles Schwab's third-quarter net income rose about 25% on Tuesday, driven by a jump in asset management fees and client assets hitting a record high, sending its shares up more than 9% in premarket trading.】

item.title: StanChart 在有关 Libor 替代率的英国法庭案件中部分胜诉
item.description: 周二，渣打银行在伦敦一家法院的诉讼中胜诉，取代了其用于确定部分股票股息率的金融基准，这是渣打银行从 Libor 过渡的一个早期案例。【原文：Standard Chartered won its bid in a London court on Tuesday to replace the financial benchmark it used to set dividend rates for some shares, in an early case over the transition away from Libor.】

item.title: 利息收入减少、准备金增加导致 PNC Financial 季度利润下降
item.description: 本周二，PNC Financial 公布第三季度净利润下降 4%，原因是该公司从客户利息支付中获得的收入减少，并预留了更大的缓冲资本，以应对在经济不确定的情况下可能无法偿还的贷款。【原文：PNC Financial reported a 4% drop in third-quarter net profit on Tuesday, as it earned less from customer interest payment and set aside a bigger buffer of capital to cover loans that may not be repaid in an uncertain economy.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，英国 SSE 拒绝了 EDP 的合并提议
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，葡萄牙主要电力公司 EDP 今年早些时候与在伦敦上市的同行 SSE 展开了合并讨论，但谈判没有取得进展。【原文：Portugal's main power utility EDP initiated merger discussions with London-listed peer SSE earlier this year, but talks did not progress, three people with familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: Platinum Equity 旗下 Ingram Micro 在美国首次公开募股中寻求最高 54 亿美元的估值
item.description: 由私募股权支持的技术产品分销商英迈（Ingram Micro）周二表示，其在美国首次公开募股的目标估值高达 54.2 亿美元。【原文：Ingram Micro is targeting a valuation of as much as $5.42 billion in its initial public offering in the United States, the private equity-backed technology products distributor said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 瑞银将标普 500 指数年底目标上调至 5850 点
item.description: 瑞银全球研究公司（UBS Global Research）周二将基准 S&P 500 指数的年终目标从早先预计的 5600 点上调至 5850 点，原因是受到企业利润增长、宏观经济背景支持和降息的提振。【原文：UBS Global Research on Tuesday raised its year-end target for the benchmark S&P 500 index to 5,850 points from an earlier projection of 5,600, boosted by corporate profit growth, supportive macro-economic backdrop and interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 花旗集团利润因潜在贷款损失库存增加而下降
item.description: 花旗集团的利润在第三季度下降了 9%，因为它预留了更多的资金来应对可能无法偿还的贷款，尤其是信用卡贷款。【原文：Citigroup's profit fell 9% in the third quarter as it set aside more money to cover loans that may not be repaid, particularly on credit cards.】

item.title: 瑞波币推出新稳定币，挑战行业巨头
item.description: 加密货币公司瑞波（Ripple）周二推出了一种与美元挂钩的稳定币，希望能颠覆一个由前两大主流货币占据近 90% 价值的市场。【原文：Crypto firm Ripple launched a stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar on Tuesday, looking to disrupt a market in which the top two incumbents account for nearly 90% of the value.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司伊夫公司获得巴西国家经济发展银行 8800 万美元贷款，用于建设第一家工厂
item.description: 电动飞机制造商伊夫（Eve）周二发表声明称，该公司已与巴西国家开发银行（BNDES）达成一项 8800 万美元的贷款协议，为其首个生产设施的开发提供资金。【原文：Electric aircraft maker Eve has secured an $88 million loan deal with Brazil's state development bank BNDES to fund the development of its first production facility, it said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高盛投资银行业务强劲，利润跃升 45
item.description: 由于投资银行受益于交易反弹，高盛第三季度利润猛增 45%。【原文：Goldman Sachs' profit jumped 45% in the third quarter as the investment bank benefited from a rebound in dealmaking.】

item.title: 沃尔格林首席执行官温特沃斯寻求扭亏为盈，将关闭 1200 家门店
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance）周二表示，将在未来三年内关闭 1200 家门店，因为新任首席执行官蒂姆-温特沃斯（Tim Wentworth）计划扭转这家受消费者支出疲软和药品报销率低影响而陷入困境的连锁药店运营商的局面。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance said on Tuesday it would shut 1,200 stores over the next three years as new CEO Tim Wentworth plots a turnaround at the struggling pharmacy chain operator hit by sluggish consumer spending and low drug reimbursement rates.】

item.title: 波音公司提交证券登记声明，股票销售额高达 250 亿美元
item.description: 波音公司周二向美国市场监管机构提交了一份注册声明，允许这家飞机制造商通过发行各种债务证券和股票筹集高达 250 亿美元的资金。【原文：Boeing filed a registration statement with the U.S. markets regulator on Tuesday that will allow the planemaker to raise up to $25 billion through an offering of various debt securities and classes of stock.】

item.title: 美国银行利润因利息收入减少而下降
item.description: 本周二，美国银行公布第三季度利润下降，原因是客户利息支付收入减少。【原文：Bank of America reported a drop in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as its income from customer interest payments shrank.】
